content.question: The writer is considering changing sentence 4 so that it clearly articulates the passage’s overarching claim. Which of the following versions of “determine...tail bones” in sentence 4 best supports this goal?

choices.label: solve the mystery of how titanosaurs became so widespread during the Cretaceous period
develop more effective techniques for extricating fossils from rugged terrain
predict with greater accuracy where to find other titanosaur fossils in Africa

content.answer: solve the mystery of how titanosaurs became so widespread during the Cretaceous period
